publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1592# Christine Grahame: Debating Time for Public Petitions Committee—That the Parliament, recognising that it must reconnect with the Scottish people, considers that the Parliamentary Bureau, the Procedures Committee or other appropriate body should take measures to ensure that the Public Petitions Committee is allocated parliamentary time to debate petitions chosen by that committee for an appropriate number of hours each sitting month.
S2M-1592# Debating Time for Public Petitions Committee (lodged on 30 July 2004) Rob Gibson*, Tommy Sheridan*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-1592# Debating Time for Public Petitions Committee (lodged on 30 July 2004) Dennis Canavan*
S2M-1592# Debating Time for Public Petitions Committee (lodged on 30 July 2004) Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-1592# Debating Time for Public Petitions Committee (lodged on 30 July 2004) John Swinburne*
